title: Sid Meiers Covert Action(GOG)
description:
Sid Meier's Covert Action - 1990

Covert Action is an action and strategy video game developed and released in 1990 by MicroProse for the DOS and the Amiga. In the game, the player takes the role of Maximillian Remington (or his female counterpart, Maxine), a skilled and deadly free agent hired by CIA, investigating on-going criminal and terrorist activities.
